import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import React from "react" import LibraryLogo from '../assets/assets/Library.svg' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const Nav = ({numberOfItem}) => { function openMenu(){ document.body.classList += " menu--open" } function closeMenu(){ document.body.classList.remove("menu--open") } return(
  • Home
  • Books
  • { numberOfItem > 0 && {numberOfItem} }
  • Home
  • Books
  • Cart
) } export default Nav
